 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָדָה‎</span>] **verb** ==have dominion, rule, dominate== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָדָה‎</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵑ7]]<sup>**Jon**</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָדָא‎</span>, ***chastise***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***tread, trample***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***chastise***, also (and so Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***radû***</u></abbr>) ***go, flow***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרָדוּ‎</span> [[Isa.14.2|Isa 14:2]]; [[Lev.26.17|Lev 26:17]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְדִיתֶם‎</span> [[Ezek.34.4|Ezek 34:4]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְדֶּנּוּ‎</span> [[Lev.25.53|Lev 25:53]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּרְדֶּ֑נָּה‎</span> [[Lam.1.13|Lam 1:13]], jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיֵרְדְּ‎</span> [[Num.24.19|Num 24:19]]; [[Ps.72.8|Ps 72:8]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְדֶּה‎</span> [[Lev.25.43|Lev 25:43]]; [[Lev.25.46|Lev 25:46]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְדֵה‎</span> [[Lev.110.2|Lev 110:2]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְדוּ‎</span> [[Gen.1.28|Gen 1:28]] ([[Joel.4.13|Joel 4:13]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ירד‎</span>); ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְדוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.29.15|Ezek 29:15]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹדֶת‎</span> [[1Kgs.5.4|1Kgs 5:4]]; [[Isa.14.6|Isa 14:6]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹדֵם‎</span> [[Ps.68.28|Ps 68:28]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָדֹדִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.5.30|1Kgs 5:30]] + 2 t.; — ***have dominion, rule***, over, usually with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person or pop. [[1Kgs.5.4|1Kgs 5:4]]; [[1Kgs.5.30|1Kgs 5:30]]; [[1Kgs.9.23|1Kgs 9:23]] = [[2Chr.8.10|2Chr 8:10]]; [[Isa.14.2|Isa 14:2]]; [[Lev.25.43|Lev 25:43]]; [[Lev.25.46|Lev 25:46]]; [[Lev.25.53|Lev 25:53]]; [[Lev.26.17|Lev 26:17]]; [[Ezek.29.15|Ezek 29:15]]; [[Neh.9.28|Neh 9:28]]; [[Ps.49.15|Ps 49:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of fish, etc., [[Gen.1.26|Gen 1:26]]; [[Gen.1.28|Gen 1:28]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּקֶרֶב‎</span> [[Ps.110.2|Ps 110:2]] with accusative of person [[Ezek.34.4|Ezek 34:4]]; [[Isa.14.6|Isa 14:6]] (perhaps + accusative of congnate meaning with verb, see [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִרְדָּה‎</span>] below); accusative omitted [[Num.24.19|Num 24:19]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִיַעֲקֹב‎</span>), [[Jer.5.31|Jer 5:31]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַליְֿדֵיהֶם‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָד‎</span> **5 h** (2); see also ingenious conjecture below II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רדה‎</span>; but &lt; [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺרוּ‎</span> ***teach***), [[Ps.72.8|Ps 72:8]] for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִרְדֶּנָּה‎</span> [[Lam.1.13|Lam 1:13]] ***and it*** (the fire) ***prevailed against them*** (my bones), read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרָ֑דָה‎</span> into my bones ***it descended*** ([[BDB#Bu|Bu]]). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹדֵם‎</span> [[Ps.68.28|Ps 68:28]] is dubious; Grill [[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִדֵם‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְרַד‎</span> [[Judg.5.13|Judg 5:13]] (twice in verse) see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרַד‎</span>. **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמְלָכִים יַרְדְּ‎</span> [[Isa.41.2|Isa 41:2]] ***and kings he causeth*** (him) ***to dominate***; but apocopatic form strange, read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרֹד‎</span> (√ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רדד‎</span> q. v.) [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחֲרִד‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]. 



 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָדָה‎</span> **verb** ==scrape out== (Late Hebrew ***id., scrape*** or ***draw off, out*** (bread from oven)); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַדְּבָ֑שׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Judg.14.9|Judg 14:9]]b out of the carcass ***he scraped the honey*** (see [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִרְדֵּהוּ אֶלכַֿפָּיו‎</span> v[[Judg.14.9|Judg 14:9]] a ***he scraped it out into his palms***; [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex</sup> [[BDB#Du|Du]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַליְֿדֵיהֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Jer.5.31|Jer 5:31]], namely, gifts, money, figurative for making gain (most I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רדה‎</span> q. v.). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַדַּי‎</span> **proper name** see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רדד‎</span>
